reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 406/21: FORM FOR POWER OF ATTORNEY

content.content: 1. A power of attorney referred to in subsection 25 (4) of the Act shall be in the form entitled “Power of Attorney - The Limited Partnerships Act / Procuration - Loi sur les Sociétés en Commandite”, as amended from time to time, that is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository.
content.raw_html: 1. A power of attorney referred to in subsection 25 (4) of the Act shall be in the form entitled “Power of Attorney - The Limited Partnerships Act / Procuration - Loi sur les Sociétés en Commandite”, as amended from time to time, that is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
